name: Quantum Sokoban
description:
My attempt at making a spin of the classic Sokoban (倉庫番) puzzle formula, with a special "entanglement" mechanic to go with the theme for the 2021 Game Maker's Toolkit (GMTK) Game Jam, "Joined Together".

If the game is not running so well on browser, I recommend downloading one of the binaries for your OS of choice.

Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement
Left Click - Entangle Blocks
Right Click - Deselect Blocks
Z - Undo
R - Reset Level

Game by Mateus Carmo (@carmo_no_sadame)

Font used: "da mad rave" by darrell Flood

UI assets and SFX: Kenney (Kenney.nl)

Music by cynicmusic

(This is my first 3D game in my first 48 hour jam, so any advice, opinions and criticism would be greatly appreciated :D)
